channel.title: Hide Game Leave Notifications To Reduce Metagaming
channel.description: I think we shouldn't get a notification when a player leaves, but just a notification when they die that they died of AFK (if they really did). This is because game leave notifications convey too much information. Just one example - if someone dies and leaves game immediately, they probably are not a poss jump. Another example - if someone is on trial and all the dead evil faction leave game, that person is probably the last evil.
